body_html:
@Carmezim Hi, I"m having the same error as above (Windows 7, pip3.6, tensorflow1.2 rc,) . I seem to have MS Visual c++ compiler, Visual c++ build tools, and Visual Studio 2015 installed and If search files (in the search bar) , Windows is able to find msvcp140.dll.

As for CUDA Path I see

System variables
------------------

variable
------------
 CUDA_PATH     C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0
 CUDA_PATH_V8_0   C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0

Is my CUDA_PATH okay?

Thank you.

body:
@Carmezim   Hi, I"m having the same error as above **(Windows 7, pip3.6, tensorflow1.2 rc,)** .  I seem to have  MS Visual c++ compiler,  Visual c++ build tools, and Visual Studio 2015 installed and If search files (in the search bar) , Windows is able to find  msvcp140.dll. 

As for CUDA Path I see


```
System variables
------------------

variable
------------
 CUDA_PATH     C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0
 CUDA_PATH_V8_0   C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0
```


Is my CUDA_PATH okay? 

Thank you.
